rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a lobby area designed for wheelchair accessibility, featuring an automatic door mechanism.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space adjoining the balcony. The design incorporates Vastu principles by aligning seating towards the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to a partial garden view, ensuring natural light and easy wheelchair movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Equipped with a spacious balcony designed for wheelchair access. The master bedroom is positioned in the north-east sector according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms (Bedrooms 2-4)
rooms.description: Each room features its own accessible balcony. Placement arranged on the west side to maintain balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Children's Room (or additional bedroom)
rooms.description: Accessible and designed with safe play zones near the garden area, placed in a secure zone as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars installed for safety. Features a shower with ramped access.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Private, accessible design with non-slip floors and adequate space for wheelchair maneuverability.
